Class JobBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hadoop.JobBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DosJob, ScanningJob, SingleFlowJob, StatisticsJob

    public abstract class JobBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class to get and run jobs in Hadoop.

      • getThread

        public java.lang.Thread getThread(java.lang.String routerIp,
                         long timestamp)
        Starts a new thread for running a job upon.
        Parameters:
        routerIp - Router IP for the job.
        timestamp - Input timestamp.
        Returns:
        A thread for which runJob is now executing.
        See Also:
        runJob(String, long)

      • getNewJob

        protected <KEY_IN,VAL_IN,KEY_MED,VAL_MED,KEY_OUT,VAL_OUT> org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job getNewJob(java.lang.String jobName,
                                                                                        java.lang.Class<KEY_MED> keyMedCls,
                                                                                        java.lang.Class<VAL_MED> valMedCls,
                                                                                        java.lang.Class<KEY_OUT> keyOutCls,
                                                                                        java.lang.Class<VAL_OUT> valOutCls,
                                                                                        java.lang.Class<? extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<KEY_IN,VAL_IN,KEY_MED,VAL_MED>> mapper,
                                                                                        java.lang.Class<? extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer<KEY_MED,VAL_MED,KEY_OUT,VAL_OUT>> reducer,
                                                                                        java.lang.Class<? extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat<KEY_IN,VAL_IN>> inputFormatClass,
                                                                                        java.lang.Class<? extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat> outputFormatClass,
                                                                                        org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path inputPath,
                                                                                        org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outputPath)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Sets up a new job.
        Type Parameters:
        KEY_IN - The type of the input key.
        VAL_IN - The type of the input value.
        KEY_MED - The type of the key outputted by Map, which is also received by Reduce.
        VAL_MED - The type of the value outputted by Map, which is also received by Reduce.
        KEY_OUT - The type of the output key.
        VAL_OUT - The type of the output value.
        Parameters:
        jobName - The name of the job.
        keyMedCls - The class of the Mapper output key.
        valMedCls - The class of the Mapper output value.
        keyOutCls - The class of the Reducer output key.
        valOutCls - The class of the Reducer output value.
        mapper - The mapper that the job will run.
        reducer - The reducer that the job will run.
        inputFormatClass - The input format class the job will use.
        outputFormatClass - The output format class the job will use.
        inputPath - The path to the data that the job will read from.
        outputPath - The path to where the job will output.
        Returns:
        The corresponding job.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
